name: project-3-group-3
description: * Accounts for users and vendors * Messaging system for users and vendors to communicate * Map/Find Vendors page to display closest vendors to a chosen location * Page for each vendor to describe their wares and the locations where food will be sold * Review system for users to leave feedback on their experiences with vendors * Vendors can edit their own page by submitting changes via form update * Vendors can upload pictures to their page
